com.intel.fightclub.coach

Class ArdaProgramUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.coach.ArdaProgramUtil

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class ArdaProgramUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utilities for retrieving program information for specific dates.

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
public static boolean wasThePlannedWorkoutCompletedForToday(@NonNull
                                                                                      android.content.Context context)
        Gets a boolean indicating whether a planned workout for today was completed. This will return true if anything other than a free workout was completed from the current program.

      • completedPlannedWorkoutForToday

        @Nullable
public static ArdaSessionSummary completedPlannedWorkoutForToday(@NonNull
                                                                           android.content.Context context)
        Gets the completed planned workout for today in the form of a ArdaSessionSummary. If there is no such workout, then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        Completed planned workout for today or null if no such workout exists.

      • completedPlannedWorkoutForDate

        @Nullable
public static ArdaSessionSummary completedPlannedWorkoutForDate(@NonNull
                                                                          android.content.Context context,
                                                                          @NonNull
                                                                          java.util.Date date)
        Gets the corresponding ArdaSessionSummary for a planned workout that was completed at the given date. If there are no completed planned workouts for that date, then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        date - Date on which the completed planned workout will be searched for.
        Returns:
        The corresponding ArdaSessionSummary for the completed planned workout in the given date, or null if no such workout exists.

      • wasProgramTerminated

        public static boolean wasProgramTerminated(@NonNull
                                           android.content.Context context,
                                           @NonNull
                                           nz.co.pltech.arda.program.api.ActiveProgram activeProgram)
        Checks if a ActiveProgram was terminated ahead of time. For example, when the user missed too many workouts to be able to continue.
        Parameters:
        context - Context instance.
        activeProgram - The active program.
        Returns:
        True if the ActiveProgram was terminated, false otherwise.

      • getProgramTerminationDate

        @Nullable
public static java.util.Date getProgramTerminationDate(@NonNull
                                                                 android.content.Context context,
                                                                 @NonNull
                                                                 nz.co.pltech.arda.program.api.ActiveProgram activeProgram)
        Retrieve date of ActiveProgram termination if present (if its either today or in the past), when the user missed too many workouts to be able to continue. If this information is already stored in Program then its completion date is retrieved. If program is not yet terminated the termination day is extracted from ARDA active workout days.
        Parameters:
        context - Context instance.
        activeProgram - The active program.
        Returns:
        Date of termination of ActiveProgram if exist for today or in the past, null otherwise

      • terminateProgram

        public static void terminateProgram(@NonNull
                                    android.content.Context context,
                                    @NonNull
                                    nz.co.pltech.arda.program.api.ActiveProgram activeProgram)
        Marks ActiveProgram as terminated in the database.
        Parameters:
        context - Context instance.
        activeProgram - The active program.

      • cancelWorkoutProgram

        public static boolean cancelWorkoutProgram(@NonNull
                                           android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Cancels the current workout ActiveProgram, if there's one.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - Application context instance.
        Returns:
        true if a ActiveProgram exists and was canceled successfully, false otherwise.
